TraitDef.label: Ansei Initiate
TraitDef.description: This Redguard has begun training in the ancient ways of the Ansei sword-singers, learning the first forms of the mystical blade arts that once split atoms.

li.label: Blade Student
li.description: Starting their journey into the ancient sword-singing arts, this pawn shows promise in mystical combat techniques.

TraitDef.label: Ansei Apprentice
TraitDef.description: This Redguard has progressed in the sword-singing arts, mastering basic forms and beginning to understand the spiritual aspects of blade mastery.

li.label: Blade Adept
li.description: Growing in skill and understanding, this pawn can perform basic sword-singing techniques with increasing proficiency.

TraitDef.label: Ansei Warrior
TraitDef.description: This Redguard has achieved competence in the sword-singing arts, capable of feats that seem impossible to ordinary warriors through mystical blade techniques.

li.label: Mystical Blade
li.description: Mastering intermediate sword-singing forms, this pawn can achieve supernatural feats of blade mastery.

TraitDef.label: Ansei Master
TraitDef.description: This Redguard has mastered most sword-singing techniques, achieving legendary status among warriors. Their blade can cut through reality itself in the hands of a true master.

li.label: Legendary Sword-Singer
li.description: Approaching the legendary heights of the ancient Ansei, this pawn's blade-work defies conventional understanding.

TraitDef.label: Ansei Paragon
TraitDef.description: This Redguard has achieved the ultimate mastery of sword-singing, rivaling the legendary Ansei of old who could "cut atoms with their blades" and split reality itself.

li.label: Atom-Splitter
li.description: Achieving the legendary mastery of the ancient Ansei, this pawn can perform feats of sword-singing that defy reality itself.
